question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the porosity of the soil?
  1. A soil with high organic content tends to have low porosity.
  2. Porosity is expressed as a ratio of volume of voids (pores) to the total volume of the material.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Porosity – The volume of water which can be held within a soil is called its porosity. It is expressed as a ratio of volume of voids (pores) to the total volume of the material. A soil with high organic content also tends to have high porosity.
